description.text: Your unarmed strikes weave together in an effortless combo, focusing on the spots you've weakened with the last hit.

sections.Benefit: Whenever you use a full-attack action or flurry of blows to make multiple attacks against a single opponent with unarmed strikes, total the damage from all hits before applying damage reduction. This ability works only with unarmed strikes, no matter what other abilities you might possess.
